criteria: Architecture Review sign-off. >80% unit test coverage on new logic. All integration tests (DB, RabbitMQ) passing. Security design for credential management approved.
success_metrics: A stable, testable, and secure foundation is ready for feature development.

criteria: Security scan clean. All authentication and authorization tests passing. Manual verification of encrypted PHI in database. >80% unit test coverage.
success_metrics: Core user-facing security features are robust and compliant with HIPAA.

criteria: Successful C-STORE reception from at least two different DICOM toolkits (e.g., DCMTK, fo-dicom SCU). Session lock is stable and passes soak testing. Performance of activity monitor is within acceptable limits.
success_metrics: The system can reliably ingest data from standard DICOM sources.
